summary: A little mod that adds the dance animations for FNIS Spells.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add animations for the FNIS Spells. I do not own any of the FNIS Files. I Just listed them. All the credits goes to the FNIS and Dance Animations Source.
<br />
<br />Installation:
<br />
<br />- Extract the file
<br />
<br />-Copy all the files inside FNISSpells toÂ Skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\character\animations
<br />
<br />
<br />Usage:
<br />
<br />1. Select an animation from FNIS Idle Selector.
<br />
<br />2. Select the spell to somebody that you want to dance (For you, there is another spell.)
<br />
<br />3. Use the spell and enjoy!

Note: You must run GenerateFNISForUsers. It's in the tools folder inside data.
author: Fore
